360770.name: MAGIX Audio & Music Lab 2016 Premium
360770.description:
This high-quality collection of effective audio editing tools captivates with technological precision and excellent audio characteristics. Experience your audio files, video sound & Internet radio stations in better-than-ever sound quality. Audio & Music Cleaning Lab 2016 Premium is perfect for creating, optimizing and adding effects to audio commentary for Let's Plays and walkthroughs.

New in this version

  • Display support for high-resolution 4K & HD monitors.
  • More than 6000 current Internet radio stations accessible through an easy-to-use interface
  • Optimized digital remastering for online videos and smartphone/tablet recordings
  • Automatically add song information and CD covers to imported CDs

Vocal recordings
Connect a microphone and record your own audio commentaries for podcasts and Let's Plays! A range of filters let you improve vocal clarity, minimize "s" sounds and reduce clipping.

Audio repair
Easily remove noise, crackling, buzzing, clipping, traffic noise and other unwanted sounds with the help of over 360 presets.

Optimize video sound
A variety of settings for optimizing video sound. A few clicks is all it takes to significantly improve the sound quality of your YouTube videos, gameplay videos and walkthroughs.

Studio quality audio editing
Whether in terms of volume adjustment, individual editing techniques or working with automatic wizards, Audio & Music Lab 2016 Premium is an impressive audio editor right across the board.

Audio and video converter
Quickly and easily convert audio and video files into standard formats.

Digitize media
A few clicks is all it takes to digitally record individual songs or entire albums from cassettes and vinyl records in superior quality (up to 96 kHz/24-bit resolution).

Available exclusively in the Premium version:

  • Superior sound quality with a resolution of up to 96 kHz/24-bit
  • Two tracks for recordings and audio editing
  • Templates for optimizing video sound
  • Video converter for all standard formats
  • Five extra effects plug-ins
  • Direct access to effects parameters
  • Five extra visual analysis tools
  • Spectral display for audio files
  • Batch processing of several files at once
  • VST 2 interface for additional plug-ins
  • Listen to Internet radio shows

Additional highlights:

Spectral editing
The spectral display provides an overview of the various frequencies of the audio track. This helps you visually identify noises such as coughing and remove them with your mouse.

5 essentialFX plug-insFive professional effects plug-ins with individual controls for brilliant sound quality and sonic experimentation. Includes eFX Gate, eFX Vocal Strip, eFX DeEsser, eFX Tube Stage, eFX Chorus Flanger.

eFX Gate
Automatic silence: This plug-in suppresses noise present during pauses in vocal recordings.

eFX Vocal Strip
For clear and striking voices: eFX Vocal Strip contains a compressor, DeEsser and high-pass filter.

eFX DeEsser
The eFX DeEsser reduces "s" sounds and plop sounds from vocal recordings.

eFX Chorus Flanger
From another planet: This plug-in lets you give your voice a synthetic alien or robot sound. Perfect for sound experiments.

eFX Tube Stage
This effects plug-in simulates the sound of an analog tube amp. Ideal for creative distortion in vocal recordings, podcasts, Let's Plays and video sound.

This program is specifically designed for audio editing, sound optimization and mastering. For creative music production or complex recording sessions, we recommend MAGIX Music Maker or Samplitude Music Studio, both of which are also available on Steam.
360770.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语
